newsitem.title: UK: STERLING LITTLE CHANGED ON INFLATION DATA.
newsitem.headline: STERLING LITTLE CHANGED ON INFLATION DATA.

text.p: 0840 GMT - Sterling little changed after UK inflation data showed higher than expected rises.
* RPI headline rate for July, year-on-year, including mortgages, was 3.3 percent compared with a forecast 3.1 percent.
* the underlying rate, excluding mortgages, was 3.00 percent, against a forecast 2.8 percent.
* Sterling stood at 2.9345/55 marks, against 2.9390/00 before the RPI announcement. Cable was $1.5785, compared with 1.5779/89.
